verses.roman:
niṣeka-garbha-janmāni
bālya-kaumāra-yauvanam
vayo-madhyaṁ jarā mṛtyur
ity avasthās tanor nava

synonyms: niṣeka—impregnation; garbha—gestation; janmāni—and birth; bālya—infancy; kaumāra—childhood; yauvanam—and youth; vayaḥ-madhyam—middle age; jarā—old age; mṛtyuḥ—death; iti—thus; avasthāḥ—ages; tanoḥ—of the body; nava—nine.
translation: Impregnation, gestation, birth, infancy, childhood, youth, middle age, old age and death are the nine ages of the body.
